mapper.select: SELECT A.ANAL_NO, A.SIMUL_NOS, A.IX_CD, A.ANAL_DATA, A.TARGET_CRP_NO, A.ANAL_DT, A.USER_NM, B.FILE_NM FROM SHRP_ANAL_HST A, SHRP_SIMLATN_HST B WHERE A.BASIS_SIMUL_NO IN ( SELECT SIMUL_NO FROM SHRP_SIMLATN_HST ORDER BY SIMUL_NO DESC LIMIT 10 ) AND A.BASIS_SIMUL_NO = B.SIMUL_NO ORDER BY A.ANAL_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHRP_ANAL_HST ( SIMUL_NOS, IX_CD, ANAL_DATA, USER_NM, TARGET_CRP_NO, BASIS_SIMUL_NO ) VALUES ( #{simulNos}, #{ixCd}, #{analData}, #{userNm}, #{targetCrpNo}, #{basisSimulationNumber} )
